channel.title: Getting onto my sever
channel.description: Ok well I havent been on sevrers for a VERY long time and, I load up the client im using (Silabs new one with skill capes) And load up my server... Put my user name as pass in and try to connect, Didnt work, Tried using it with no port didnt work, Tried it with local host and 127.0.0.1, I even tried to get it working the last time by doing ip as 0.0.0.0 and port as 21 but it didnt work... When I load up my run.bat I get 'Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use' So i closed mopar andtried again, I get the came message in my run and it also says that my server IS loaded... So... Can anyone help me getting on... Thanks

item.title: Getting onto my sever
item.dc:creator: @kalius kalius
item.description:
@kalius wrote:

Them, I dont know what the problem is… All the info is in the first post… I wont why I cant connect

Read full topic

item.title: Getting onto my sever
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

kalius:

Im sure its the run.bat of the server that I already have so I downloaded a new server, Edgescape 2, Lets hope is works

All run.bat does is start the Java interpreter and executes your program… It doesn’t have anything to do with the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting onto my sever
item.dc:creator: @kalius kalius
item.description:
@kalius wrote:

Ok, Ill reset my pc in a sec, I just tried it again with mopar and it keeps saying that Error connecting to server, I tried 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 both with port 21 (because its when it worked last time) and they both dont work, Both get error connecting to server[br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2007, 05:22:46 PM[/size][hr]Im sure its the run.bat of the server that I already have so I downloaded a new server, Edgescape 2, Lets hope is works

Read full topic

item.title: Getting onto my sever
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Well obviously you won’t be able to connect to a server if the server can’t bind to the port.

Restarting your computer is the most simple solution (hopefully) to fix the port already in use problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting onto my sever
item.dc:creator: @kalius kalius
item.description:
@kalius wrote:

Ok well I havent been on sevrers for a VERY long time and, I load up the client im using (Silabs new one with skill capes) And load up my server… Put my user name as pass in and try to connect, Didnt work, Tried using it with no port didnt work, Tried it with local host and 127.0.0.1, I even tried to get it working the last time by doing ip as 0.0.0.0 and port as 21 but it didnt work… When I load up my run.bat I get ‘Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use’ So i closed mopar andtried again, I get the came message in my run and it also says that my server IS loaded… So… Can anyone help me getting on… Thanks
